sentences.sContent: One of Belfast’s most famous landmarks, the Grosvenor Hall, has been demolished.
sentences.sCn: 贝尔法斯特最著名的地标之一格罗夫纳大厦已被拆毁了。

synos.tran: [航]陆标，地标；[建]里程碑；[地理][测]地界标；划时代的事

remMethod.val: land (土地) + mark (标志) → 地标 (领土分界线) → 界碑

trans.tranCn: [航]陆标；地标；界标；里程碑；纪念碑；地界标；划时代的事
trans.tranOther: something that is easy to recognize, such as a tall tree or building, and that helps you know where you are
